comments.author: Roland Weber
comments.body:
Hi Sebastian,

we call them "wire log" and "context log". I suggest to rename the properties
to "httpclient.test.loglevel.context" and "httpclient.test.loglevel.wire".

otherwise, +1 from me

cheers,
  Roland

description:
The default log level is debug, which produces quite a lot of output when testing.

The patch allows separate definition of wire and other log levels (assuming SimpleLog is used)
